Use a balloon as a water balloon: Fill the balloon with water and use it to water plants or water your garden. Simply tie the balloon to the stem of the plant and let it soak up the water.
Use a balloon as a decoration: Cut the balloon into different shapes and sizes and use it as a decoration for parties, events, or even your home.
Use a balloon as a sound amplifier: Inflate the balloon and place it over a speaker or musical instrument to amplify the sound.
Use a balloon as a balloon dart: Cut the balloon into different shapes and sizes and use it as a balloon dart. Simply tie the balloon to a string and launch it at your target.
Use a balloon as a float: Inflate the balloon and tie it to a string or rope to use as a float for your boat or watercraft.
